description.translate: Here's to you, Adrian, a brave warrior	who will never go into decline.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Rouleciel\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7A toi, Adrian, guerrier valeureux\"}","{\"text\":\"§7qui ne connaîtra jamais de déclin.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Here's to you, Adrian, a brave warrior\"}","{\"text\":\"§7who will never go into decline.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a4 §7DAR§a2 §7LUC§c-1\"}"]}}
